page.title: 05Neatishead: Alderfen Broad
page.content:
06340319 NEATISHEAD: THREE HAMMER COMMON A predominantly farming area enclosing the satellite village of Three Hammer Common with Neatishead Church. Secondary roads connect to Horning and Irstead.
06350319 NEATISHEAD: ALDERFEN BROAD A landlocked Broad with considerable area of open water. Broad is the site for extensive research into water purity and re-establishment of natural vegetation and marine life - most of the drainage dykes have been diverted around the Broad so that water quality can be controlled. Farming carried on between fen, marsh and drainage dykes.
